name: Don't Let Your Light Die, We'll Get Through This!
name_original: Don't Let Your Light Die, We'll Get Through This!
description:
I made this game for LD37 where the theme was "One room."

Only have the source code in GML, working on getting the export for windows working.

Controls:

  • Left Click: melee / knockback.
  • Right Click: shoot.
  • Q: Create Familiar.
  • E: Upgrade Familiar.
  • Shift: Dash.
  • Space: Shield.
  • WASD movement

It lasts around 3 mins! Good luck!
